Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class DebugMessages

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.DebugMessages
public class DebugMessages extends Object
this class contain static method to print colored error/messages -> those messages can be disabled by changing the statics boolean inside this class
